import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import {Col, Row} from 'react-bootstrap' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from "react-router-dom"; import './App.css'; import Top from './components/Top' import Left from './components/Left' import Right from './components/Right' import Footer from './components/Bottom' import Home from './components/pages/HomeContent' import Cart from './components/pages/Cart' import Checkout from './components/pages/Checkout' import ProductDetails from './components/ProductDetails' import AboutContent from './components/pages/AboutContent' import HelpContent from './components/pages/HelpContent' import NotFound from './components/pages/NotFound' import AppContext from './context'; function App() { const state = useContext(AppContext) return (
{/*top component */} {/* left and right components and a switched main cneter content */} {/*footer component */} < Footer/>
); } export default App;
